ThingDef.label: persona conventional assault rifle
ThingDef.description: Fully-automatic assault rifle, capable of accurately firing short bursts of high-velocity bullets. An "all-around workhorse" equally effective at both short and medium ranges.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person.
